get.summary: Get shipyard information in pages for the currently logged-in user.

post.summary: Creates a shipyard associated with the logged in user.
post.description: The shipyard ID must not be set when creating a new shipyard. If this happens, an HTTP 400 error status code value of will be returned.

400.description: Bad request. The shipyard ID value was set or other error condition.

put.summary: Updates shipyard information for the currently logged-in user.

get.summary: Get shipyard information in pages for the currently logged-in user filtered by shipyard name search phrase.
Get shipyard information for the currently logged-in user.

put.summary: Updates user information for a currently logged-in user.
put.description: Does not currently update user email and login.

get.summary: Returns the URL to be used for logging out a user from Auth0
get.description: Logging out of Auth0 should also trigger user logout in the OSC API Server and OSC front end applications.

403.description: Accessing the resource you were trying to reach is forbidden

post.description: After successful registration and email verification by the user, a successful call to the /api/users/login endpoint will provide the access token needed to make subsequent API calls.

400.description: Bad request. User may already exist or validation errors.
